project_abstract.cdata: The overall objectives of the Animal Feed Project are the following: 1) alleviation of supply constraints of critical feed ingredients; 2) improvement and expansion of the utilization of agroindustrial byproducts for use as high-quality livestock feeds; 3) improvement of the organizational efficiency of the feed sector through specialization and integration; and 4) restructuring of project enterprises to effect greater corporate efficiency and commercialization.  The project is essentially a financial intermediation operation directed toward increasing supply constraints and strengthening the feed sub-sector infrastructure, and comprises six types of domestic feed ingredient or service capacity building sub-projects or components and one feed sub-sector strengthening component.  The six capacity building components include: 1) integrated feed and livestock production; 2) feed additives manufacture; 3) feed protein crop production; 4) feed processing equipment design and manufacture; 5) enhanced-protein feed product synthesis; and 6) feed commodity wholesale marketing.

P003563.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>饲料项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的总体目标是：（1）缓解关键饲料成分供应紧张状况；（2）将工农业副产品更多地用于生产优质牲畜饲料；（3）通过专业化和一体化措施提高饲料行业的组织效率；（4）调整项目企业结构，提高企业效率和商业化水平。本项目实际上是一个旨在缓解饲料供应紧张状况和加强饲料行业基础设施的金融中介项目，包括六个国内饲料成分配置或服务能力建设子项目和一个饲料行业加强子项目。六个能力建设子项目是：（1）饲料和畜牧生产一体化子项目；（2）饲料添加剂生产按项目；（3）含饲料蛋白农作物生产子项目；（4）饲料加工设备设计和制造子项目；（5）蛋白强化饲料产品合成子项目；（6）饲料商品批发市场子项目。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
